definition: lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: You should show greater respect for your elders and betters .
sentences.chinese: 你應該對長輩和上級尊重些。

sentences.english: Many believe that children are corrupted by their elders' vices.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲，小孩子被他們長輩的劣行所腐化。

sentences.english: Our elders exaggerate about love in college. They say love is a waste of time and money.
sentences.chinese: 我們長輩們總是過於誇張大學校園裏的愛情。

sentences.english: Yes, sure they should be but not at the cost of disrespecting their elders.
sentences.chinese: 但是對他們的呵護不能以對長輩的無禮爲代價。

sentences.english: This friend talked about the unforgiven attitude of other relatives.
sentences.chinese: 這位朋友說起孩子出生後長輩的不諒解。

sentences.english: The warmth which exuded from the anecdotes about his ability and demeanour were always enough to illustrate.
sentences.chinese: 長輩們口口相談他的能力，態度的已經是最好的說明。

sentences.english: Talk to an older family member you have helped in the past.
sentences.chinese: 跟一直幫助你的長輩談談心。

sentences.english: I would like to admit the eldership's ideas, so I could walk steadily.
sentences.chinese: 願意接納長輩們的建議，讓自己走得更穩健。

sentences.english: He adopts an avuncular tone of voice when giving advice to junior colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 他用長輩的口氣勸告年輕的同事。

sentences.english: It is impolite for children to cut in when their seniors are talking.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在他們的長輩談話時插嘴是不禮貌的。

sentences.english: Is it any wonder they embrace a weirdness that baffles their elders?
sentences.chinese: 難怪他們作怪不斷，隔開了長輩。

sentences.english: Some eldership would like to sacrifice his own image to create the image of China.
sentences.chinese: 有的長輩甚至不惜犧牲自己的形象來塑造中國的形象。

sentences.english: I would congratulate him if my leader or elder has accomplished something.
sentences.chinese: 上級或長輩有某些成就，我會恭賀他。

sentences.english: So every elderships don't worry about me, I would not be reasonless .
sentences.chinese: 所以長輩們請放心，我不會瞎跑。

sentences.english: In our family, anyone who disobeys their superior will be severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 在我們家，所有違忤長輩的人都將受到嚴厲處罰。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
